function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Compliance with governmental mobility restrictions leading to reduced visits to green spaces.","Impact":"Decreased access to open spaces for physical and mental well-being.","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, relaxation of restrictions, and provision of alternative indoor activities.","Technologies":"Public communication platforms, surveillance technology for crowd monitoring.","People":"Residents of Krak\\u00f3w.","Owner":"Local government and health organizations."},{"Description":"Fear of infection leading to reduced visits to green spaces.","Impact":"Decreased outdoor physical activity and increased mental stress.","Mitigation":"Education on outdoor safety measures, regular disinfection of public spaces, and promotion of outdoor activities with social distancing.","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, monitoring and crowd control technology.","People":"Residents of Krak\\u00f3w.","Owner":"Local government and health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of free time as a reason for reduced visits to green spaces.","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for relaxation and exercise.","Mitigation":"Flexible working hours, promotion of short outdoor breaks, and development of accessible green spaces close to residential areas.","Technologies":"Scheduling software, urban planning tools.","People":"Residents of Krak\\u00f3w.","Owner":"Employers, local government, and urban planners."}]}
